title: 정동탁
content:
정동탁은
ERICA캠퍼스
과학기술융합대학
의약생명과학과 교수다.
ERICA캠퍼스 과학기술융합대학 홈페이지 참조(2025.03.)
목차
1
학력
2
경력
3
주요 논문
4
교내매체
학력
2000. 한양대학교 이학사
2003. 광주과학기술원 이학석사
2008. 광주과학기술원 이학박사
경력
1) Assistant professor, Cardiovascular Research Center, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai, New York, USA (2018-2020)
2) Instructor, Cardiovascular Research Center, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai, New York, USA (2013-2018)
3) Postdoc, Cardiovascular Research Center, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai, New York, USA (2008-2013)
주요 논문
SUMO1-dependent modulation of SERCA2a in heart failure. Nature. 2011 Sep 7;477(7366):601-5.
Inhibition of miR-25 improves cardiac contractility in the failing heart. Nature. 2014 Apr 24;508(7497):531-5
Matricellular Protein CCN5 Reverses Established Cardiac Fibrosis. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2016 Apr 5;67(13):1556-1568.
miR-25 Tough Decoy Enhances Cardiac Function in Heart Failure. Mol Ther. 2018 Mar 7;26(3):718-729.
Role of SIRT1 in Modulating Acetylation of the Sarco-Endoplasmic Reticulum Ca2+-ATPase in Heart Failure. Circ Res. 2019 Apr 26;124(9):e63-e80.
Analysis of extracellular vesicle miRNA profiles in heart failure. J Cell Mol Med. 2020 Jul;24(13):7214-7227.
교내매체
<뉴스H> 2025.03.07
한양대 ERICA, ‘안전관리 우수연구실’ 3곳 인증 획득... 연구실 안전관리 우수성 입증
